data.title: DESCENDANTS OF GEORGE BYRNE
data.text:
=========== == ====== =====

Billie Jo Runyon and Don Norman

1. GEORGE BYRNE

George Byrne was born about 1720 in Wicklow, Ireland. He married

LYDIA STEELE. Land deeded to him in Prince William Co, VA April 5,

1740. In 1752 and 1753 he was engaged in surveying around Winchester.

Was bitten by a mad dog and died soon after reaching home. In 1744 he

became guardian of 3 orphan boys, sons of William Brown -- William,

John & George. In 1766 lived on Spiller's Neck on Occaquen River.

Children of George and Lydia (Steele) Byrne

2. (1). SAMUEL D. 1793

m.Clarissa Buckner

3. (2). Margaret

m.George Ash

4. (3). Elizabeth d.Dec 29 1783

m.Boliver Buckner

m.William Brown c. 1756.

2.SAMUEL BYRNE 1. GEORGE BYRNE

Samuel Byrne, a son of George and Lydia (Steele) Byrne, was born

in 1766 in Prince William County VA. He married his niece, Clarissa

"Clary" Buckner, a daughter of Boliver and Elizabeth (Byrne) Buckner.

In 1794 the family moved to Preston County VA and in 1798 to present

day Braxton County WV.

Children of Samuel and Clarissa (Buckner) Byrne.

5. (1). Peyton d.May 11 1824

m.Barbara Linn

6. (2). John Byrne

7. (3). Thomas d. 1820

m.Esther Robinson Apr 2 1807

8. (4). Sarah b.Feb 11 1768 d.Mar 7 1831

m.Thomas Bland

m.Jacob Zinn

9. (5). Mary "Mollie" b. 1770 d.Apr 22 1803

m.Colonel John Fairfax 1792

10. (6). Charles b.May 5 1775 d.Jun 13 1843

m.Charlotte Ash Mar 2 1797

11. (7). Elizabeth

m.Archibald Anderson in 1802.

12. (8). Samuel

3.MARGARET BYRNE 1. GEORGE BYRNE

Margaret Byrne, a daughter of George and Lydia (Steele) Byrne,

married George Ash.

Children of George and Margaret (Byrne)Ash.

13. (1). Francis

14. (2). George

15. (3). Sallie

16. (4). Jane

17. (5). Permella

18. (6). Anna b. 1763 d.May 4 1806

m. Thomas Brown Oct 20 1785

19. (7). Mary

20. (8). Elizabeth

4.ELIZABETH BYRNE 1. GEORGE BYRNE

Elizabeth Byrne, a daughter of George and Lydia (Steele) Byrne,

died December 29, 1783. She first married Boliver Buckner. Boliver

died and she married William Brown about 1756.

Children of Boliver and Elizabeth (Byrne) Buckner.

21. (1). Clarissa "Clary"

22. (2). Anthony b.Jul 15 1748

23. (3). Ann

Children of William and Elizabeth (Byrne) [Buckner] Brown.

24. (1). John

25. (2). Thomas

m. Anna Ash

26. (3). Lydia

27. (4). Mary Ann

5.PEYTON BYRNE 2.SAMUEL BYRNE 1. GEORGE BYRNE

Peyton Byrne, a son of Samuel and Clarissa (Buckner) Byrne, was

born in Prince William County VA and died in Lewis County VA (WV) May

11, 1824. He married Barbara Linn before 1790. Barbara, a daughter of

Michael Linn, was born in Prince William County and died in Lewis County

May 18, 1838. The family moved to Preston County VA in 1794 and then to

present day Braxton County WV in 1798, where they were the first

settlers in Burnsville.

Children of Peyton and Barbara (Linn) Byrne.

28. (1). John Brown b.Apr 17 1790d.Jul 8 1846

m.Ann Haymond 1815

29. (2). Thomas

30. (3). Peyton Buckner

m.Sary Ann Gundecker

31. (4). Charles

32. (5). Elizabeth

m.Joseph W. (Jesse) Arnold Dec 16 1838

33. (6). Mary

34. (7). Samuel B. b.Jan 13 1798 d.Feb 8 1867

m.Juana Fernandez Hagans

35. (8). Nancyb.c. 1792

m.Wilson Haymond

6.SARAH BYRNE 2.SAMUEL BYRNE 1. GEORGE BYRNE

Sarah Byrne, a daughter of Samuel and Clarissa (Buckner) Byrne,

was born in Prince William County VA February 11, 1768 and died March

7, 1831. She married Thomas Bland Jr. Thomas went to KY to buy land

and died on the trip.

Sarah married Jacob Zinn. Jacob Zinn, a son of George and Mary Anna

(Seiler) Zinn, was born about 1775.

Children of Thomas and Sarah (Byrne) Bland.

36. (1). John

37. (2). Samuel

38. (3). Thomas III b.Jan 19 1793

m. Mary "Polly" Newlon Feb 17 1815

39. (1). Major William B.

40. (2). Charles B.

41. (3). Peyton

42. (4). Clara

43. (5). Permelia

Mary "Mollie" Byrne, a daughter of Samuel and Clarissa (Buckner)

10.CHARLES BYRNE 2.SAMUEL BYRNE 1. GEORGE BYRNE

Charles Byrne, a son of Samuel and Clarissa (Buckner) Byrne, was

born in Price William County VA May 31 1775 and died in Preston County

VA (WV) June 13, 1843. He was Clerk of Court of Preston County from

1818 to 1843 and was a Major in the VA Militia.

He married Charlotte Ash March 2, 1797.

Children of Charles and Charlotte (Ash) Byrne.

56. (8). Julia b.Nov 5 1810 d.Apr 28 1851

m. William G. Brown

57. (9). John P. b.Jan 24 1812 d.Jul 14 1862

m.Mary Ann Ray

11.ELIZABETH BYRNE 2.SAMUEL BYRNE 1. GEORGE BYRNE

Elizabeth Byrne, a daughter of Samuel and Clarissa (Buckner)

Byrne, married Archibald Anderson in 1802.

GEORGE BYRNE

John Brown Byrne, a son of Peyton and Barbara (Linn) Byrne, was

daughter of John and Mary (Wilson) Haymond, was born December 24, 1790

and died December 25, 1846.

BYRNE

Samuel B. Byrne, a son of Peyton and Barbara (Linn) Byrne, was

BYRNE

Nancy Byrne, a daughter of Peyton and Barbara (Linn) Byrne, was

He married Sabina Creigh Sterrett in 1845. Sabina, a daughter of

August 30, 1853. John married Jane Hamilton February 2, 1860. Jane,

a daughter of John McKee and Rebecca (Robinson) Hamilton, was born in

Nicholas County VA June 28, 1826.

John Peyton Byrne, a son of John and Frances Catherine (Squires)

141.GEORGE COBLE BYRNE 88.JOHN BYRNE 60.JOHN PEYTON BYRNE

28.JOHN BROWN BYRNE 5.PEYTON BYRNE 2.SAMUEL BYRNE 1.

GEORGE BYRNE

George Coble Byrne, a son of John and Frances Catherine (Squires)

Byrne, was born in Braxton County WV October 22, 1893 and died August

15, 1958. He married Margaret Virginia Heater December 14, 1922.

Margaret, a daughter of Jacob Benjamin and Emma (McCartney) Heater,

was born in Braxton County January 12, 1900 and died there June 28,

1990.

George served in the US Army in Europe during World War I.

Children of George Coble and Margaret Virginia (Heater) Byrne.

156. (1). Benjamin Howard b.Sep 11 1923 d. Dec 5 2006

m.Miriam Pletcher Apr 21 1946

m.Sheila Ann (Miller) Groves Oct 15 1983

157. (2). Margaret Catherine b.Jan 4 1929

158. (3). John Maxwell b.May 7 1933 d.Aug 1 1988

Benjamin Howard Byrne, a son of George Coble and Margaret Virginia (Heater) Byrne, was born in Braxton County WV September 11, 1923 and died in Harrison county WV December 5, 2006. He married Miriam Pletcher April 21, 1946. He married Sheila Ann (Miller) Groves October 15, 1983.

He served in the US Army in Europe during World War II.
